name: Spitkiss
description: Spitkiss is a colorful platformer that lets you enter into the lovely world of the Spitkissers, tiny creatures that communicate through body fluids and emojis.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i5-4210 1.7ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard soundcard or better
